body:
Alright guys, after almost a month, I've finally managed to film and edit a new montage video of me getting monuments. This time, it'll feature Senex, Ternio, Venomous, Luar, and Abandoned Park. Enjoy! :D

http://youtu.be/xYjdMKAGHn8
body_tagged:

title: Finally :D

replies.body: Noice <3 a tip, next time mute your video sound before rendering the complete video, it is kind of annoying to hear the chests, and the walking sounds tbh, otherwise great montage <3 I was in it <3 :D
